column5: That first picture in the morning is unreal. Thanks for sharing, nice to catch a few fish too
Sounds like a good trip to me. I was up North last week for some piking on the Nipissing and had a world of fun.    Art
Nice shots!!! You guys got the slop perch pattern down pat!!!
Hey, I can see your photos now......what did you do different?  Nice perch, and great photos too!!  S.

Thanks Guys!    That is awesome to hear Sinker - we used tinypics before to upload all of our photos but for other reasons we started using imgur instead (cleaner pictures and super simple to do multiple photos at a time - we were recommended it by a friend) - pumped that it also fixed the other issue.  We had only heard from a couple of people they didn't work so I can't imagine how many people actually didn't see them.  Happy everyone can view things now!!!
Agreed, love that first pictures.  Great shot!!!
Great post and fabulous photos. Thanks for sharing!!
Pics are immense now.  Like reading a report at the Friendly Giant's Castle. lol.
